title: Junior Software Developer
points: ◎ Developed an FFMpeg-based playblast generation tool where you could add slates, timecodes, comments, and create a reviewable assets.
◎ Built a social asset management system. Graph database (Neo4j), Python on the backend. DCC (Maya) integration, desktop, and Angular web app.
◎ Implemented procedural geometry generation for appleseed, a physically-based render engine.
◎ Wrote publish pipeline tools for Maya using ftrack.
